name: Show_Node Cabinet
action:
<*ALLOWATTRIBUTES(APP Node in Cabinet Preference,Hardware_Design_Selection - EAPP Node,Ent_app_cab_tpm,Node_Supplier_EAPP,Additional_Hard_Disk_EAPP,EAPP_Mounting_Type,Display_Supplier_EAPP,ServerLocClusNetwork_Group_ACET)*>
[IF]([IN](<*VALUE(Interface with TPS Required?)*>,Yes,No,)){<*SETOPTIONAL(Additional_Memory_EAPP)*><*DISALLOWATTRIBUTES(Additional_Memory_EAPP)*>}{<*ALLOWATTRIBUTES(Additional_Memory_EAPP)*><*SETREQUIRED(Additional_Memory_EAPP)*>}[ENDIF]
<*xDisallowallValuesExcept(ServerLocClusNetwork_Group_ACET:<* LIST ( SELECT AttValue FROM ClusterAttValues WHERE CAST (AttValueCode AS float) <= '<*CTX( Container(List of Locations/Clusters/Network Groups).Rows.GetCount )*>' ) *>)*>
